title: FULLY FURNISHED!! 3 bedroom/2 bath house
posting_body: painted interior with a fenced in backyard is waiting for you!
House is FULLY FURNISHED!!Hardwood flooring throughout home with security
Nestled in SW Atlanta by busy
Perfect rental property for starter family!
Rent is due on the first at $1,200 and deposit is $600.
No credit requirements or long application as long
as you are honest and have the funds.
Home is available for tours late August and available for rent 09/01/2022, or for immediate move in if comfortable with terms.
***This is my private home that I am renting (not through any agency).
I decided to extend my tour at the last minute and I will be stationed near Germany for at least the next 2 years.
***| will not be able to physically show the house, but I have a lockbox on the door with the keys inside so I would just need to give you the code.
If comfortable with that option deposit will be due immediately and first months rent or prorated rent will be due after move in.
***If the unit is still available late August, I will have to resort to renting through a company and increasing the rent.
